website_summaries.verdict: An affordable car vacuum with user friendly features and accessories that make it a solid deal for the price. Add the excellent customer support, and you have the best deal.
pros: Offers exceptional features for a value price point that include washable stainless steel HEPA filter, LED light, and accessory tools
It also garners praise for being easy to use and supported by extremely attentive customer service
cons: While the 12 volts of power is sufficient for most consumer's needs, it tends to be a bit lacking in suction when it comes to picking up large items and pet hair

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Strong Suction & Cordless
customer_reviews.text: Came packaged very nice. Everything fits perfect in the carrying case it came in which makes it easy to store and transport. Chair lasts a sufficient amount of time. Strong suction to pick up those stubborn Small particles. I've been keeping it in my car to vacuum dog hair off the seats. Also works great to get pet hair off of couches. Good pricing Overall a great product that gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: lilokie

customer_reviews.title: Practical and convenient
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned at first because the charge light never turned green like the directions read. But, after 2 days charging, I decided to try it. The green light is on when in use, it is unbelievably quiet and perfect for the hard wood stairs including sucking up the loose dog fur!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for little mess with good suction
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad i got this cordless vaccum it is very convenient and perfect for little mess which does not require to use the big vaccum. It comes with attachments and the suction is very good. This would great for cars and pecfect for parent with little kids that like to make a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Noel C Gwekoh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Assembled the day it arrived and has almost zero suction. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: I already own a corded vacuum and decided to go with this cordless vacuum, and I am extremely satisfied with my decision. It is really lightweight, easy to use and the battery life is amazing. The sound is very reasonable and the suction is really strong that I could not believe it is a cordless vacuum. This thing can pickup big and small stuff from any kind of surface.I am really glad I bought this vacuum and I highly recommend this product. It comes with various accessories that make it very easier to clean. Have used it for multiple times so far and works great each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle wang

customer_reviews.title: this is such a great vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple and easy usable cleaner.The cordless vacuum cleaner is lightweight and extraordinary griping size.it fulfill my expectation what I actually wanted.now I can clean my cars, sofas and also useful accessories easily.the most important thing is that it makes my life more happy. I love this vacuum cleaner. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to vacuum up pet hair from my wood stairs instead of using the full size vacuum. It has minimal to no suction power, is very difficult to clean, and overall is not worth the money. I never had a problem with the battery dying, but I never used it for more than a few minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: LittlePea333

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and compact handheld vacuum perfect for car or your carpet I’m very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: DREMI

customer_reviews.title: No suction!
customer_reviews.text: As much as i wanted this to work, it doesnt! Even though i read all the bad reviews, i did see some good ones too! I was optimistic but this let me down, it has no suction power at all! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Can be used at home and in the car, very small and convenient
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Weak Suction
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend. While the design, the attachments and the cute little bag are nice and all... This vacuum just does not do the job. The suction is awful. Can barely suck up a single piece of dirt. Will be returning it for one with more suction power. Have 0 complaints about the seller or the shipping, though. Arrived on time and everything was as described, I just need some thing a little stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Fine for small areas
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean my car and cast area. It’s fine for small areas, but I wouldn’t use if for anything big it would take forever. The sucking power could be better, but good enough for the uses I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Quality is horrible
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is it’s too small ... it’s loud but doesn’t pick up that great I wish it was bigger It’s ok A month later and it broken I do not recommend this st all very upset
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Weak suction.
customer_reviews.text: If you are purchasing this item to vacuum your car/suv don’t waste your money, it will not pick up pet hair or clean the floor mats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comes really handy
customer_reviews.text: I've gifted it to my friend who has a toddler and her house gets messy. She say's this picks up the dry food and food crumbs easily off the floor. Suction works very well when used on car seats and floor mats. Very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Worst suction ever
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to have this to help keep my new car clean. No joke, couldnt suction up a pebble and barely moved some leaf fragments. Not sure if I received a busted unit, but complete unusable. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Falotico

customer_reviews.title: Low on power
customer_reviews.text: Worked okay the first time I used it but performance dropped off quickly. The ease of cleaning is negated by the fact I don't use it anymore since it can barely suck a crumb off the carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Battery Dead after 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed with this vacuum cleaner based on the positive reviews prior to purchase. After two months of 3 times per week use for approximately 2 minutes, the unit stopped working. Battery was fully charged and the unit operated for only 10 seconds. After several attempts to re=charged with blue light on, same thing happened. Rather than looking at other cordless brands, decided to purchase a corded hand held vacuum. Read other reviews of highly rated cordless vacuum products and most reviewers indicated battery is their biggest issue with lost of powder or stopped working after short-term usage. Highly advise not to consider this Hikeren product as a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: great for cleaning the car interior
customer_reviews.text: I Uber people from time to time and sometimes the passengers can be a bit messy. This vacuum works well for me in the car whenever I need a quick clean. I really like how it sucks up hair with ease and that the filter is reusable after washing it. It would be nicer if you can charge it in the car as well.
customer_reviews.author: yoeleven

customer_reviews.title: good customer service/update
customer_reviews.text: this little vac died after 2 months. i initially loved the small size and planned to use it in my craft room. i used it infrequently...when it worked it was great. but 2 months of service was very disappointing. the seller was great though and sent me a replacement without being asked to do so and asked for a re-review. i will revisit this in november to see if the first was just a fluke. so far, so good. it is november now.....and this little guy is still working like a charm. the first must have been defective, but the company generously replaced it. very happy with this little vac.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good on carpeted stairs, but only lasted 9 months!
customer_reviews.text: Update: after using every 3 weeks for 9 months, it no longer works! It charges fine, turns 'blue' when ready, but when I slide switch to turn it on, it starts flashing red again and does not work. Bummer! I bought this so I could safely vacuum my steep carpet staircase in my home. It charged quickly and the suction is very good on carpet and even sucks up cat litter! I like the clear window, so I can easily see it is working. It is a bit loud (high-pitch), so wear earplugs.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary S.

customer_reviews.title: Waiting on a Replacement
customer_reviews.text: I am unsure what world the creators of this noise machine are from, but it must have been a planet with a lot less gravity cause this vacuum cant lift small pieces of dirt off a wood floor. This thing has the worst suction I've ever seen. It was so bad I was sure I must have missed a plastic bag over a filter or something. I'm not sure what these other reviewers are trying to suck up with this thing, but if it's not feathers it probably won't work. Update: The manufacturer is doing everything necessary to try and remedy the issue. I'm very impressed with their support. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jack T.

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at the suction for it's size!
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised by this mighty little vacuum. At first I was impressed by it's amount of suction, until I realized that it's charge life had gotten me behind both couches as well as all base boards... and it was still good to go. That was a revelation to me, I used to have to charge my old handheld vac two to three times to get that chore completely off my list. So that was a nice surprise. I love that it's cordless, that makes it easier to get into hard areas without having to backtrack to reseat cords. All in all, great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Chryssy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I had a 12v powered car vacuum, it was so easy to clean my car. But it was broken after 10 years' use. I got this one because it could also be used in my house for small vacuuming job like my computer keyboards, desk etc. It comes with an extension which I plan to use it for cleaning bulbs. The regular vacuum is just too heavy for this job.
customer_reviews.author: B. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible noise!
customer_reviews.text: This handheld vacuum is OK! The accessorirs are great! But the fan noise on this thing is aweful! If you have anyone in your home with sensory issues or if you have pets with good hearing, forget about this thing. My autistic kiddo is usually not too bad with noises, but this one caused a freakout. And I understand why. The high pitched noise that comes out of this thing is painful even for my ears! Had it not been for this extreme noise, I would easily give 4 stars. But I can’t stand that noise.
customer_reviews.author: ColericV

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and comes with attachment pieces
customer_reviews.text: Usually I don't get off brand products and just stay with the basics but this popped up on Amazon recommended and checked out the reviews and they seem good. I will say I am very surprised with this vacuum. I bought it because my toddler likes to make a mess when he eats snacks like crackers and I wanted a small vacuum for the kitchen. I also got it to clean our vehicles out and I will say it literally had such great suction and it comes with tools to use for smaller spaces or rugs! I'm highly impressed and 100% recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Lightweight Hand Vac with so many Attachments!
customer_reviews.text: My hikeren Handheld Vacuum arrived today and I couldn't be happier. It is compact and lightweight so it is easy to hold and not bulky and heavy like some others. The vacuum includes multiple attachments and a storage case which makes it easy to have everything you need altogether. This also makes it perfect for trips or other outings. Not having to constantly pay for replacement filters is the icing on the cake. I heartily recommend this product. It is well made and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: mamaj

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Badly needed for dog hair. Read other reviews for suction power and easy clean - very important for me, this was an easy pick. My busy week does not leave me enough time thoroughly clean our house, this vacuum saves me so much time for quick clean ups especially when I have unexpected company. One very important factor is how easy it is to take apart for emptying, a tiny task I usually dread but not anymore thanks to this. No need for branded and expensive cordless handheld vacuums. Satisfied buyer!
customer_reviews.author: FYHDLG

customer_reviews.title: Great little handheld vaccum!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I opened the box how small this handheld vaccum was; however, after using it a few times I think this is one of it's great attributes. It's light weight, fits into a nice carrying case for storage and has great sucking power. I also appreciate all of the attachments. I mainly bought it for cleaning up pet hair off of furniture and car seats. It was also very helping in picking up pine needles and small pieces of glitter off the floor. I'm really happy with the purchase - definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KmaeL50

customer_reviews.title: Good for small messes like the car, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for a car or small messes, but the container is so small that using it for any larger mess requires multiple dumps. Suction is ok, but the added tools helps with tight spaces. Update: the customer service team, upon reviewing my post, reached out on their own to offer me a refund. I thought this was excellent service, so I’m increasing the review. Also, as I said before the product works decent for small messes. Cleaning out your car on occasion would be a great use for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: surprised at this super powerful little vacuum cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I was already tired of taking out the large vacuum and having to assemble and disassemble and besides that sometimes I did not reach the plug cord I opted to buy a vacuum that was not expensive or cheap, but at the same time had the same suction force. This exceeding my Expectations, it is very light in weight, the vacuum cleaner is rechargeable, you plug it into the electric power and it charges very fast and it also lasts a long time for the battery to run out, the easy to clean, the easy to remove filter and the best part is the filter is washable, and I can take it for everywhere excellent product I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: No Suction Power
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a vacuum to keep in my car to clean up dirt and debris. I decided to give this a try due to the reviews which I read, and the several attachments with which the vacuum came. After one week of use, I quickly came to the realization that this vacuum has terrible suction power. It struggles to pick up the smallest of debris, and my car looks just as dirty after 10 minutes of "vacuuming" than when I started. The exterior design and the bag that it came with are nice, but it fails to execute its primary function of vacuuming. Overall, I recommend to keep looking for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Bravo

customer_reviews.title: The upholstery attachment works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cordless rechargeable little vacuum to clean to cat hair on my bed 🙄😒 I really love my cat so I ‘allow’ him to lounge on one part of my bed while he naps during the day but that means I have been using sticky rollers every day to clean that area if his hair. Now I use this little vacuum with the upholstery attachment to clean it up instead. It’s fast and effective. I can use it to touch up other areas of the house too when I’m doing a quick once over. I store the vacuum right under my bed where I use it and it’s saving lots of time and sticky paper 😁
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cordless vacuum cleaner does the job very well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cordless vacuum cleaner does the job very well. This is a great vacuum cleaner to clean the car especially. Since this is not bulky and cordless this can reach out all the narrow spaces with dirt and suck everything out of it. Rather surprisingly this has some power even though it is comparatively small. This does the job quite well and it is very easy to operate as well. The quick charge option is great and I can highly recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Gayathri Rajapakse

customer_reviews.title: Hand picking crumbs would be quicker than using this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash of a cordless vacuum. Not sure how it got so many good reviews, must be fake. Vacuum has zero suction. Turn on and it takes damn near 5 seconds to fully operate. Sounds like a cyclone and you really believe that it's going to pick up crumbs.. but NOPE. You literally have to press down into the carpet to pickup any little piece and it clearly struggles to do its job. Picking up crumbs by hand would be more effective than this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This handheld little vacuum is great. It charged quickly. It was so much more convenient to use on my stair case that is part carpet and part hardwood floor. It cleaned seamlessly on both surfaces. It is light weight but of superior quality. The attachments prove to be useful when getting all the nooks and crannies of my home. My 3 children are professional mess makers. My favorite part is the built-in light that shows the area you are cleaning. A lot of times my own shadow is darkening the place I'm cleaning so the light is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this vacuum sucks just not literally
customer_reviews.text: Is it supposed to take me 12 passes to pick up a tiny bit of cat litter? Is it supposed to only briefly hold that little bit of cat litter in it's tiny reservoir before it all dribbles back out? If so, then please excuse my low rating because this vacuum actually does work exactly as intended. Also, surprisingly loud for how small and terrible it is - which to be fair this is now my online dating bio.
customer_reviews.author: graceat

customer_reviews.title: Nice but ANNOYINGLY LOUD
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a handheld vacuum to help vacuum my stairs, my car, and the little hard to reach corners of the house and this fit the bill. It has great suction BUT it is SO LOUD! Compared to my normal vacuum, it’s like this one is trying to harmonize with it at a pitch that only dolphins would enjoy....I’m on the fence about keeping it because the noise is just that grating.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't resist the pun, but wish it had just a tad more suction. For the size, it's pretty impressive. I had a larger one previously and ordered this due to positive reviews. I'm not disappointed but cannot really give an outstanding 5-star rating. It picks up spilled Cheerios and peanuts, but I doubt it would lift small stones. Haven't tried, however. A good little portable vacuum. It has never run out of juice on me.
customer_reviews.author: A. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Suction is awful.
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 4 months and never really reach for it bc it has awful suction. It’s easier to literally wipe dirt up with my hands and a wet rag the. Go over it 100 times with this thing. Wish I had returned it during the return window. The suction has been getting worse too over time and I have probably only used it a handful of times. Very disappointed and honestly shocked at the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JBLAKE

customer_reviews.title: Works OK for small bits of debris, sucking bugs.
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum was as expected for the price. Moderate suction, build appears to be fairly good quality. I like the extended tube for sucking bugs. Fills up and looses suction quickly if used for dog hair. Didn't work too well on auto carpets. Description is confusing ...tag line indicates 12 v while the detail description indicates "14.8v lithium". Decals on the unit confirm that it is only 12 volt and I seriously doubt that it has a lithium battery, as the instructions state that it will lose charge over time. Instructions also say not to charge for more than 3 days, so it apparently does not have overcharge protection.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: For the price this vacuum is great, it is strong enough to vacuum kitty litter and kitty food which my old shark vacuum was having a hard time with. I like that it doesn't have a big base charger as well, just a tiny cord so it's doesn't need a designated area. It also comes with a long hose which I find to be very helpful when you are 39 weeks pregnant and don't want to bend down as low. I like that it has a stainless steel filter, though I haven't tested it by cleaning it yet. Sounds like they also have a very good replacement/return policy so overall I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: denny

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this to use for our couches and our car, when I started using this in our living room this vacuum got all the dirt is our couches, found out that our couches was so dirty, the dirt storage was so full!!! Love how it the furniture thoroughly!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Mother’s Helper
customer_reviews.text: My car was filled with dust and crumbs until this vacuum came to the rescue. It has great suction power with 3 different accessories that made it easier to clean the entire car and make it spotless. I was able to reach down with one of the accessories that cleans narrow spots and vacuum my stairs. It has a long battery life and is easy to empty out. The best is that it comes with a bag to organize all the parts., so no worries about loosing anything.
customer_reviews.author: Unbelievable Movie

customer_reviews.title: It sucks, but doesn't blow
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well for a fairly cheap vacuum. Has an odd noise when first starting it up but after that it runs and sounds fine. I do like that the bag that comes with this is large enough to fit not only the vacuum itself, but all the accessories that come with it and the charger so you can easily keep it stored up and in your car. Do wish it came with a car charger too but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nothing spectacular
customer_reviews.text: Overall I would say just okay. Suction power is horrible. I know it’s only a handheld but unless it’s weightless crumbs or free hair not stuck to fabric it works fine. As for hair stuck to a couch or bedding or even out of a drawer it doesn’t impress me much. Battery life is awesome though. Once completely dead, charged it for about 5 minutes, had full power again. Comes with cool attachments which are helpful but again, suction power becomes less powerful. Easy to clean out and disassemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Campa

customer_reviews.title: Work effectively
customer_reviews.text: It's small, light and cordless and has good suctions. it does the job, little vacuum can be using around the house, but the sucking power decreases when the filter and container gets full, need to make sure clean out the inside. the vacuum charges quickly as well and is simple to empty. Definitely recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: SaSusan

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I work at a car dealership as a service advisor, and I was looking for a cordless vacuum that wasn’t too bulky but also had great suction to clean my “loaner” vehicles with. And HOLY CRAP! The suction on this vacuum is stronger than my Bissell that I use at home. I absolutely love the carrying case that it comes with! It’s not as bulky as I imagined it would be. (Which is a plus) But it’s large enough to hold all the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: SarcherTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, convenient, works well
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient and perfect for mess which does not require to use the big vacuum cleaner. This attribute makes it very suitable for car vacuuming. It has very good suction power and it is easy to clean. The battery supplies power for enough time and the vacuum comes with a charging adapter. With the help of provided accessories that come with the vacuum, you can pick up big and small stuff from all kinds of surfaces. The design looks good and stylish. It comes with a case, so you don't have to worry about all the accessories gone missing. Suggestion: addition of battery power level indicator would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jaman Anu

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty and noisy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction. REALLY, REALLY LOUD !!!! almost need earplugs due to its high, piercing noise -- expecially if you're in a small area, like your car or a closet. Dirt needs to be emptied often as dirt catcher is very small. Compared to my old Dust Buster, the battery charges quickly and holds a charge for a long time. Just not as quiet as the old Dust Buster! It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, but lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I love this little guy! It’s smaller and more lightweight than my older one, but with excellent suction, which makes it much more functional to use throughout the house — crumbs on the furniture, ashes around the fireplace, windowsills, stairs. The hose attachment goes on and off easily, so it’s perfect for cleaning hard to reach places like under the stove or between the washer and dryer, (see video). The canvas bag keeps everything together and organized. No more searching the closets looking for my main vacuum attachments I simply pull this out and clean up any mess. I definitely need another one to keep downstairs—it’s that handy!
customer_reviews.author: OC girl

customer_reviews.title: Terrible suction, sketchy business practices.
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the Seller just reached out to me to delete my review and offered me a full refund AFTER I delete it. A weird way to handle this situation. The vacuum still doesn’t work well. Doesn’t really suck anything up. I’ve tried it with different attachments and it doesn’t work very well. It looks nice and the battery lasts but it doesn’t really do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie Peyer

customer_reviews.title: Zero suction.
customer_reviews.text: This thing had zero suction. Thankfully, the shipper refunded my money, but I threw it away for being completely useless. That's the only reason I gave an extra star. Maybe I got a faulty one, but I'm not trying again to see.
customer_reviews.author: Houston prime member

customer_reviews.title: Get something that really sucks.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum isn't powerful enough to get... Well, pretty much anything I've tried to suck up. It worked in my windows pretty okay, got cobwebs and some sediment. I purchased this to clean my car. It's so ineffective, it's laughable. Smaller than I expected. Really pretty, with a variety of attachments. If you actually have a substantial mess to clean up, I advise against this pretty little thing. Get something that really sucks..
customer_reviews.author: Joan E. W. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum sucked! Pun intended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to handle, easy to take apart and clean, very light weight. However, with the attachments hooked up, the suction power was lost. I could not even get crumbs picked up in the car with it.... anything that was remotely stuck on the carpet like hair or a "stepped on" cracker, would not pick up. It just kind of moved the debris around. Sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Its a great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was sick of lugging out my vaccum. I have used this on ceiling fan dust, cat hair on furniture and other small random messes. It even sucks up cat litter! This vaccum is light weight and charges fast. I was skeptical because of the off brand, but I am so happy with it. It is easy to empty/clean and comes with many attachments. I live in a small condo and it is also easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Dhillon

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: ❤️I Love it! So handy! I've been looking those kind of vacuum for a long time, it's so hard to clean the car with the big one. I was so surprised everything can fit in that small bag. I can easy put it in my car . Now I would never be worry about the problems.it is the best small vacuum I have ever used. It works great . Easy to carry , easy to use.'''''''
customer_reviews.author: Danny cheng

customer_reviews.title: Only good for light duty (crumbs, dust, etc) Will not clean pet hair.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because of the great reviews. Seems well built and looks cool. Definitely smaller than expected and has surprising power for the size, but still not much suction. It’s really only for very light duty, like spilled crumbs. I bought It to remove cat hair from my chair but it can’t do that. It’s kind of loud too. I think I’ll keep it in my car and use it to vacuum sand I track in from the beach (hopefully it can handle that).
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully compact! The suction is pretty strong. I have 2 young boys and purchased this to clean up after small spills. It does that and more, making it extremely convenient. I now don't need to pull out my large vacuum to tackle small messes. If there is a downside it's that it doesnt have a wall mounted docking station cause I would pay more for that option.
customer_reviews.author: Dagon

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction
customer_reviews.text: Peru little suction. Won't pick up much . This is the second hand vacume I have bought from you. I thought if I paid more it would be higher quality, I was wrong . The first one was. A Black and Decker. Which brand is usually good. It got to where it wouldn't charge. The spot where it was supposed to charge had melted but thankfully hadn't started a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Esther McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Cordless Vacuum that is light
customer_reviews.text: Love this handheld cordless and portable vacuum cleaner. Used this to vacuum my couch and it works flawlessly. Its able to suction all of my dogs fur plus more! I was surprised it was able to pick up other particles I can't even see that was on the couch. Maintenance is a breeze, love the fact the filter is reusable, just need to clean/wash when done using. The charging is very fast itself. Comes with the other accessories that you can use to adjust when you are vacuuming. Love the bag it comes with, able to put everything in there and store it in a nice spot. Does not take alot of space which I absolutely like.
customer_reviews.author: Adventurous

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LITTLE VACUUM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m absolute happy with this little vacuum! I got it yesterday and of course!, I tested it right away. My car was a real mess and I thought the battery wasn’t going to last. For my surprise, I had enough time (like 1/2 hour) to clean all the mats. The suction power is very good. It’s very lightweight and very easy to clean. One of the accessories that was essential for me is the soft pipe because it lets me vacuum in places in the car that I couldn’t reach with my old one vacuum. So needless to say, I highly recommend it if you want a very small lightweight vacuum with the power of a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Compact but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is compact but powerful. The compact size makes it so easy to carry and store. The parts coming with the vacuum are perfect for reaching small spaces. It came with a bag that is very convenient to store the vacuum and the tools. The design and material of the filter makes it very easy to clean. I love the wireless function. So convenient to clean cars. No need to drag the long wire and no need to go to the car wash places to use the huge vacuum. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JY2016

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I only gave one star off because I feel the suction does not perform as well on carpet as it does on hard floor...BUT with that said it really it great. It's not large at all which I like! I really got it for my kids as I am teaching them to clean up after themselves and this a great devise for them to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Edit: the Seller just reached out to me to delete my review and offered me a full refund AFTER I delete it. Unprofessional and would mislead other consumers. Charged it overnight, Absolutely no suction couldn’t even pick up small dog hair. Don’t waste your money I can only imagine it stops working sooner than later.
customer_reviews.author: Hi!

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have accessory to keep your car clean on the go. We were pleasantly surprised with the quick delivery, packaging and the bag that it came with making it very convenient to carry around and keep at one place. The vacuum cleaner has adequate suction power and comes with an extension that will help you get into the tight areas that a normal vacuum cleaner is just too big for. It also comes with a brush, a flexible wand and carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: zhiping

customer_reviews.title: Very small and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little vacuum for the price. We bought it to use on our boat to clean up real quick and it definitely does the job. It is smaller than I expected but that makes it easier to store on the boat. It comes with a super convenient carrying case. All the attachments fit inside as well. If you're looking for a small, portable hand held vacuum this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Durable, fast charge, Good power!
customer_reviews.text: We have infant children and looking for something quick for cleanup in our vehicles. This item does the trick! Easy to store and fast to charge, has great battery life and suction power. Easy cleanup for those small snacks that our children throw everywhere during travel! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brian h.

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is a great handheld vacuum. It’s light weight enough where your arm won’t get tired if you’re using it to get some up high spots. Works great for cobwebs with the hose attachment. The suction power was very surprising. That’s probably the most impressive thing about it. Rechargeable lithium ion battery is a major plus too!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Forar

customer_reviews.title: Small but terrible.
customer_reviews.text: This product is tiny but powerful. Amazingly the battery last that I'm done cleaning and still running with plenty of power left. I love the filter, it is robust, no need replacing as long as I keep it cleaned (unlike my other brand). Congrats to design engineer, very well thought of. Good product, I recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact and portable!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is perfect size to clean small spaces and small amount of dirt. It is louder compared to its size but gets the job done. Has a good suction power based on its capacity. Quick and easy to clean small mess, will cleaner bigger mess but may take extra time. Worked perfectly well on my carpet. So far had no issues with the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jignesh

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: If you want something to pick up some simple things, than you could go with this device. If you want real power then you should look someplace else. I picked this up so I put something in the call for quick clean-up. Two kids can make an awfully big mess. If I had to pick this again, I would look someplace else.
customer_reviews.author: RalphC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for pint-sized helpers
customer_reviews.text: This little handheld vacuum has great suction. I put it to test immediately, vacuuming out the back of my mom car. It did great on larger things like goldfish as well as small crumbs. This is also the perfect size and heft for the little helper in your life. My daughter thinks cleaning up her messes is fun with the vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina H.

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed about this. I bought it for around the house, quick clean ups with 2 dogs and a cat. It barely picks up the hair off the dog beds unless I go over it again and again and again. Saves more time to just get the big vacuum out. Probably will wind up buying something else and throwing this one in with the camping stuff for tent clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Dolin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good little tool.
customer_reviews.text: I am overall quite happy with this handheld vacuum. If I was to be picky I'd like a tiny bit more suction power and for the filter to be smooth instead of ribbed. The channels in the filter can be a bit difficult to clean but it all comes apart easily so you can clean each component. The battery life is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy G.

customer_reviews.title: Better for car  than house.
customer_reviews.text: I really hate leaving bad reviews. But the truth is that this vacuum is absolutely useless in the house. It cannot pick up cobwebs and the spiders just don't even run from it. l have not tried it in the car yet, but I suspect it will be more useful for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo

customer_reviews.title: Nice little powerful handy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient. I tried it in different places including the carpet and most importantly in the car. After a quick 15 min cleaning binge, it csgiht a fair number of dust bunnies and hair. The bag to fit all of the attachments and charger was nice. No filters to buy separately. The decorations on the side was coming off but that minor.
customer_reviews.author: Harry K

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something compact to vacuum my car and this is PERFECT! It comes with a hose and attachments that make getting into the small spaces very easy. This is very portable and easily kept in the car too! It comes with a charger and a carry bag that hold the vacuum, charger, and all the extras. Love it...great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great little vac
customer_reviews.text: Did not look at dimensions before ordering, so was a bit surprised at how small it is, but am impressed with how well it sucks up the cat litter on all floors which is what I bought it for. Fully charged in just a few hours, super easy to clean and I like not having to order replacement filters. Only negative is that it is very loud, scares the cats worse than my full-sized vac.
customer_reviews.author: J. Greenough

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to clean up my rabbit and guinea pigs play room. They are mostly potty trained but stray poops are found around the room and little hay pieces cover everything so this cuts my cleaning time in half. It is a great vacuum. Smaller than I thought but it is very powerful.
customer_reviews.author: HollyAnne

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase. Great price.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent quality vacuum cleaner that I regularly clean in my car. One battery charge lasts for several cleanings, which is impressive. Power is good, collects any kind of garbage, leaves behind a clean surface. The filter can be washed, which is very convenient. Various nozzles are available. Thanks to them, you can vacuum in difficult places. The vacuum cleaner itself is compact, takes up little space in the car. You can charge the device from the cigarette lighter of the car or from the general network. The total charging time is 3 hours. I am very pleased with the device and I recommend everyone to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Annet

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not powerful enough for kitty litter spills
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum to remove spilled kitty litter from a textured plastic mat. The upside is that it’s very quiet, but unfortunately the suction is not powerful enough to handle kitty litter, at least not expeditiously. I’m sure it would be fine for dust and lighter debris, though, so I may move it to my car for spot clean ups.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great for ride share drivers!
customer_reviews.text: So my husband started doing ride share a d we have 4 kids. Needless to say, keeping the van clean is ROUGH! So I got this instead of the daily run to a car wash place and this has been working great! The attachments are a nice bonus but I havent really needed them and the battery lasts quite a while so far! And I LOVE the carrying case! Fits everything perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: good product, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: the delivery speed is also very fast, the response from the seller is fast and friendly, the items are original and as expected, the packaging is also satisfying. Thank you very much the items are original and as expected, the packaging is also satisfying. interesting products happy to buy this product, this product is very good and very satisfying, so I will assume it will last a long time, I will have no problem buying another or recommending it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for a while. By the time I recieved the vacuum, I thought it was a empty box because it was really light. The battery life for this vaccume is incredible too. And it is also small that I can kept it on my car without wasting any space. The handle is comfortable and the noise is not big as well. And it is in reasonable price range too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: No suction, but you probably can fix it.
customer_reviews.text: It had essentially no suction. If I removed the filter, the suction was fine. I examined the filter and saw NO holes in it, and I could not blow through it, so I took a straight pin and punched many very small holes through the filter. Now the vacuum works fine.
customer_reviews.author: star man

customer_reviews.title: Great for a cordless handheld vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: So for what it is this vacuum is pretty good. It does suck like it should really easy to clean comes right apart. It is not as powerful as a full sized vacuum but that should be expected because it is cordless. It does come with a hose and a brush attachment which worked great for cleaning a vent in my hallway. Battery lasts quite a while as well I didn't even kill the battery before I stopped. All in all it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mills

customer_reviews.title: Zero suction
customer_reviews.text: Product design looks awesome, however there is no suction with this product whatsoever.I purchase it to sweep up after my cat kitty litter. It wouldn't do that so I tested it on some dust in the corner and all it did was push around. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E Blake

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Depends on what your expectations are and what you use it for. For me it’s borderline, to vacuum my car takes a long time and clogs the filter half way through, the suction power is not that great and needs several passes. If you need something to pick up some dirt every now and then is perfect but not for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Danny S

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY- NO SUCTION
customer_reviews.text: I had a Dirt Devil which broke after about 4 years; I bought this and the suction is awful- it barely sucks anything up. It is cheaper but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Patty P

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I may have been going into the purchase hoping it would clean up cat litter from a rug in my dorm room however, I was sadly mistaken. I can pick up easy things my regular shark cheap vaccine, however I was hoping I could get into corners that just make the rug look dirty. So in conclusion don’t buy something just because it’s an amazon choice. I wasted 30-40 bucks
customer_reviews.author: Carly Broome

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and small to store
customer_reviews.text: Great product that is very easy to charge, used it in my car and it was great and cleaned up well, also used it on my stairs as it has been pickup using the electric Hoover and apparatus on stairs. Easy to clean and small enough to store in a cupboard. High recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Works great !
customer_reviews.text: This light weight hand held vacuum worked great right out of the box. Like others that posted a review it is rather loud but you can wear ear plugs if it bothers you. Had very good suction. I liked that it is light weight, had attachments and even came with a bag to store everything including the vacuum inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super light and handy and the suction power is so heavy
customer_reviews.text: As a handheld vacuum, it's just awesome. I used it in my car cleaning, my kitchen cleaning and sometimes when I feel tired to use my big vacuum cleaner I just have done simple jobs with it. Its main advantage is its heavy suction power. The battery life is also pretty decent. I used upto 4 hours with one charge. I liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Shusmita Saha

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this vacuum at all. It would suck up the sand/dirt and drop it right back out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Island girl

customer_reviews.title: Very good suction
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a handy vaccum for my car and areas in the house a reg vaccum can't reach. I'm happily surprised at the sucking power of this little thing. Also, I can hold it easy without my wrists hurting. This makes cleaning almost fun!
customer_reviews.author: Edana Silke Stearns

customer_reviews.title: 1 yr of usage
customer_reviews.text: It died after 1 year of minimal usage. It didn't come in contact with water and I turned it off while charging. I charge it and then go to turn it on for usage and it works, the blue light comes on the suction begins for 5 seconds (literally) and then the indicator light turns red and it dies. It was great while it lasted 🤷🏽‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum cleaner! It's very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that the era of huge noisy vacuum cleaners is over. Now I clean the house with such a portable gadget. Thanks to my husband for ordering such a gift for me. It saves many strengths, nerves, time. Everything is easy and simple. Now I clean both the floor and the upholstered furniture at the same time. I do not have to lift the vacuum cleaner, pull it along, they are afraid that the child will fall due to the cable. I advise all housewives to order such a gadget and you will get a pleasure from cleaning. I was convinced of this.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Peters

customer_reviews.title: It died on the second run. Ouch.
customer_reviews.text: It died on the second job with a flashing red light. Fully charged as well. I cleaned everything out and made sure that everything was dry, but it's dead. Went over every bit. I did an autopsy on it and found no moisture or clogs inside. R.I.P. Don't cheap out on vacuums. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning car and pets hair
customer_reviews.text: This hand vacuum is amazing. You absolutely don’t expect how powerful it is. The suction is really strong for a hand vacuum. It’s really good for cleaning small spaces. I used it to clean my car and worked perfectly with all the attachments that comes with that. It went under my seats no problem. I highly recommend especially if you have a dog that sheds a lot like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

product_meta.title: Handheld Vacuum,hikeren Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, 12V 100W with Quick Charge, Light Weight Portable Hand Held Vacuum, Durable Stainless Steel Filter, Carry Bag, Black
product_meta.description:
Why Hikeren Handheld Vacuum?

►Cordless and Compact
Hikeren handheld vacuum can free your movement when at home, in corners, car interior, and so on, without bulky and tangled cords.

►Poweful and Portable
With 12V Lithium and 100w motor, Hikeren handheld vacuum sucks up more fine dust by increasing airflow to generate stronger suction of more than 5kpa.

►Quick charge and Consistant Suction
Powered by Lithium battery, Hikeren handheld vacuum ensures 30mins of continuous use on a quick charge(3-4h) by an included charging adapter.

►Multi-functional Accessories
The stainless steel filter equals to 20 normal HEPA filter, can be washed 500 times, one filter for life-long use
The rubber nozzle is used for suck up liquid messes. 
The duckbill is used for cleaning the gap and air conditioner outlet.
The carrying case can store all your vac and accessories inside, very comopact and space saving

How to better use your Hikeren Handheld Vacuum??

1. Turn off the vacuum when charging.
2. Do not use the vacuum during charging to protect battery life.
3. The filter is made of Washable Fabric which is washable; you don't need to replace the filter for each use.
4. When dumping garbage, please hold the dust collecting cup steadily.and Please make sure to use HIKEREN charger. 
5. If the vacuum battery is fully discharged, the LED lights will not flash until 3-hours-charging.
6. It will take 3-5 hours for the vacuum battery to fully charged again.
7. The maximum water absorption can not exceed 10ML.Avoid the number of times a vacuum cleaner absorbs water
8. When the vacuum cleaner suction is not enough, it is recommended to clean the filter after drying before use .
9. Wet filter will cover the suction, so please dry up the filter before use!
10. The filter must be secured in the dust canister to prevent dust and dirt from entering the vacuum's motor.
feature_bullets: 🔶【POWERFUL CYCLONIC SUCTION】With 12V Lithium, 100w motor and radial cyclone Hikeren hand-held vacuum provides a stable 5000PA strong cyclonic suction, good for daily quick pick ups. The best gift choice for your relatives and friends.

🔷【LONGER RUNNING TIME】Unlike other rechargeable vacuums, Hikeren rechargeable vacuum can perform up to 30mins with its higher capacity and quick charge tech(3-4h), which is really rare in today’s market.

🔶【PORTABLE AND CORDLESS】Cord-free, hassle-free! Hikeren cordless vacuum is lightweight and portable. Free your movement whenever and whereever, without bulky and tangled cords, help you escape from fatigue clean.

🔷【DURABLE STAINLESS STEEL FILTER】 Hikeren rechargeable Vacuum has a removable and washable stainless steel filter, (20 times that of normal Hepa filter ) enhance the powerful suction, ideal for thorough cleaning.

🔶【ADDITIONAL TECHNOLOGY SUPPORT】Hikeren handheld Vacuum HAS PASSED CE, FC and UL CERTIFICATION. If you have any questions about Hikeren products, we will do our best to win your satisfaction. Hikeren is ready for your inquiry, please do not hesitate to email us: HikerenService@outlook.com.
